/home/ubuntu/cloud-project-final/backend.serviceRawFile:
org: elicervantess
service: api-usuarios

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.12
  region: us-east-1
  role: arn:aws:iam::633777173661:role/LabRole
  environment:
    PYTHONPATH: src/
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET}
    TOKEN_EXPIRY: ${env:TOKEN_EXPIRY}

plugins:
  - serverless-dotenv-plugin
  - serverless-python-requirements

custom:
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: true
    fileName: requirements.txt

functions:
  create_user:
    handler: src.create_user.lambda_handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: users/register
          method: post
          cors: true

  login_user:
    handler: src.login_user.lambda_handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: users/login
          method: post
          cors: true

  validate_token:
    handler: src.validate_token.lambda_handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: users/validate-token
          method: post
          cors: true

resources:
  Resources:
    UsersTable:
      Type: "AWS::DynamoDB::Table"
      Properties:
        TableName: ${sls:stage}-t-users
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: "tenant_id"
            AttributeType: "S"
          - AttributeName: "user_id"
            AttributeType: "S"
          - AttributeName: "email"
            AttributeType: "S"
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: "tenant_id"
            KeyType: "HASH"
          - AttributeName: "user_id"
            KeyType: "RANGE"
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: EmailIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: "email"
                KeyType: "HASH"
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL

package:
  exclude:
    - __pycache__/**
    - venv/**
